Class RestaurantDTO

java.lang.Object
it.uninsubria.dto.RestaurantDTO
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class RestaurantDTO extends Object implements Serializable
Data Transfer Object for Restaurant information. This class is responsible for encapsulating restaurant data to transfer between client and server. Uses public fields for direct access without getters and setters.
Author:
Lorenzo Radice, 753252, CO
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • RestaurantDTO

      public RestaurantDTO(String restaurant_id, String r_owner, String r_name, Double avg_price, Boolean delivery, Boolean booking, CuisineType r_type, AddressDTO address)
      Constructor with all fields.
      Parameters:
      restaurant_id - Unique identifier for the restaurant
      r_owner - Username of the restaurant owner
      r_name - Name of the restaurant
      avg_price - Average price in euros
      delivery - Whether the restaurant offers delivery service
      booking - Whether the restaurant allows online booking
      r_type - Type of cuisine from the enumeration
      address - Address information encapsulated in AddressDTO

    • RestaurantDTO

      public RestaurantDTO(String r_owner, String r_name, Double avg_price, Boolean delivery, Boolean booking, CuisineType r_type, AddressDTO address)
      Constructor without ID for creating a new restaurant. The ID will be assigned by the database.
      Parameters:
      r_owner - Username of the restaurant owner
      r_name - Name of the restaurant
      avg_price - Average price in euros
      delivery - Whether the restaurant offers delivery service
      booking - Whether the restaurant allows online booking
      r_type - Type of cuisine from the enumeration
      address - Address information encapsulated in AddressDTO

    • RestaurantDTO

      public RestaurantDTO()
      Default constructor for serialization. Initializes a completely empty RestaurantDTO.

    • getAvgRating

      public Double getAvgRating()
      Gets the rating of the restaurant. This field is not part of the original DTO but is used for displaying ratings.
      Returns:
      Rating of the restaurant, can be null if not set

    • setAvgRating

      public void setAvgRating(Double avgRating)
      Sets the rating of the restaurant. The rating must be between 0 and 5, inclusive. If the value is outside this range, it will be set to null.
      Parameters:
      avgRating - Average rating to set, can be null

    • getReviewsNumber

      public Integer getReviewsNumber()
      Gets the number of reviews for the restaurant. This field is not part of the original DTO but is used for displaying review counts.
      Returns:
      Number of reviews, can be null if not set

    • setReviewsNumber

      public void setReviewsNumber(Integer reviewsNumber)
      Sets the number of reviews for the restaurant.
      Parameters:
      reviewsNumber - Number of reviews to set, can be null
